授業目的:
＜Listening＞ The purpose of EC1 Listening is to help students to understand different kinds of conversations and improve vocabulary and understanding of natural connected speech sounds.
＜Reading＞The purpose of EC1 Reading is for students to practice introductory intensive and extensive reading.
< Speaking＞ The purpose of EC1 Speaking is to develop students' ability to talk about themselves and their experiences with a partner. 
<Writing > The purpose of EC1 Writing is for students to practice introductory academic writing.
到達目標:
＜Listening＞ Students will be able to understand short conversations and learn useful vocabulary from the conversations (intensive listening). They will also listen to and generally understand longer, easier texts in English (extensive listening).
Students will be able to 1) improve reading speed and comprehension of articles 2) develop reading confidence, fluency, speed 3) learn new vocabulary.
< Speaking＞ Students will be able to 1) have short conversations with a partner (includes asking and answering ＜Writing＞
Students will be able to 1) improve their accuracy of basic grammar 2) improve their writing fluency 3) be able to write and format a short academic paragraph and 4) be able to communicate with teachers by email.
特記事項: 【合併】English Communication I　Ａ（総合政策学部）/英語コミュニケーションI　Ａ（総合政策学部）
授業方法: For all EC classes, materials, instruction and class communication are in English. Course materials will be available to students through LUNA.

トピック.授業計画1:
*All 14 classes will be conducted face-to-face.
<Listening> EC1 Listening covers 6 topics. Students will listen to interviews about each topic and study associated vocabulary. They practice using the language they have learned to answer questions about themselves.
<Reading> In class, students will practice intensive reading skills and learn vocabulary by reading articles and complete response tasks for the graded readers.
< Speaking> EC1 Speaking has four main components: 1) students talk about themselves and their experiences 2) students study practical English items 3) students read and talk about a picture story 4) students talk freely about a wide range of topics.
<Writing> Students will 1) Practice writing on a given topic for a short period of time 2) Complete a task that involves useful grammar and vocabulary and 3) Learn basic paragraph structure.
トピック.授業外学習2:
Students will listen to dialogues and story books for homework. They will also study vocabulary.
Students will read graded readers, write graded reader response tasks, take online quizzes, and study vocabulary.
Students will complete grammar exercises, write short responses to reading tasks, and develop basic academic paragraphs.
